titles.title: A bill to designate the United States courthouse facility located at 301 North Miami Avenue, Miami, Florida, as the "C. Clyde Atkins United States Courthouse".

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S6065)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

bill.summary:
5/14/2007--Introduced.
Designates the United States courthouse facililty located at 301 North Miami Avenue, Miami, Florida, as the "C. Clyde Atkins United States Courthouse."
